Question.Subject: How do I get more formspring questions?
Question.Content:
When I posted it on facebook to start with I got loads but now everybody has it I don't get as many, does anybody know how to get more?
My formspring it formspring.me/imquitecool if anybody wants to ask me anything :P
I don't have a myspace or tumblr to post it on so please don't suggest that
Question.ChosenAnswer:
make a twitter. it works really well. people say "ask me things" and they get tons of questions
follow me, reblog me http://smokingfish.tumblr.com/

Answer.Content:
same problem haha.
mine's www.formspring.me/Muranduuuh if youve got any questions haha.

make a twitter. it works really well. people say "ask me things" and they get tons of questions
follow me, reblog me http://smokingfish.tumblr.com/
